attributes.action: Claw back the housing allowance claimed by Jaqui Smith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it might be enforceable in a court of law, but it is not enforceable in the court of public opinion and that is where the government steps in.

Public opinion is against this claim, even though it is within the law.  The Government must therefore ask its Minister to return the money

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
